entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: hoisting float var profitability mis-categorizes SIMD types #82351
    8.0.0
  • Unnecessary boxing of value types in System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonValue`1 #82349
  • Elide two redundant checks in implementation of ICollection.CopyTo(Array, int) in common collection types #82344
  • [NativeAOT] Out of memory reporting on Linux #82337
    8.0.0
  • JIT: reconsider use of BBF_DONT_REMOVE on EH blocks #82336
    8.0.0
  • JIT: support dead block elimination for EH handlers #82335
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Stackoverflow reporting on Linux #82334
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient Hangs for Certain GET Requests with HTTP 1.1 #82327
  • [API Proposal]: CreateParameter() method for DbBatchCommand #82326

Closed

  • QEMU support for ARM64 #13648
    Future
  • SSL RemoteCertificateNameMismatch error in a chroot build environment #80413
    Future
  • Add option to remove DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader #82339
  • Assertion failed: GCHeapUtilities::GetGCHeap()->IsInFrozenSegment(obj) #82252
    8.0.0
  • Dynamicaly loading "Microsoft.Codealaysis" fails in Net6 but works in 7 #78349

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Model CPU flag dependencies explicitly in LIR #82355
  • Revert "Revert Allow some intrinsics in Tier0" #82354
  • Disable bigevent test under GCStress #82353
  • Fix loop hoisting float var profitability calculation #82352
  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    community-contribution
  • Replace COMMA with a Statement in impCastClassOrIsInstToTree #82348
  • Keep side effects in impOptimizeCastClassOrIsInst #82346
  • Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82340
    community-contribution
  • Format host tracing for deps parsing for easier reading #82333
    area-Host
  • Fix unbalanced brackets in clrjit natvis GenTree output #82332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor computing lvaLongVars/lvaFloatVars #82331
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix issues with EH in unexecuted loops #82329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Stop setting DOTNET_JitStress in a couple of newly added tests #82341
  • Optimize JIT_ClassProfile32 #82014
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove unused block flags #82330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix FnPtrTypeDesc::GetManagedClassObject #82325
    area-System.Reflection
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Revert "update alpine test images" #82309
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [MONO] Implement GC.AddMemoryPressure in Mono #82121
    area-GC-mono
  • Disable System.Reflection.Tests.TypeDelegatorTests.FunctionPointers #82321
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • Add EventPipe library support to CrossGen2 #82200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2117834 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thunk page generation and mapping for iOS-like platforms #82317
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • Optimize ReplaceLineEndings #81630
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Ensure only one empty string exists in the UserString heap. #80273
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82322
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Initial Patch for RISC-V support #82294
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Environment.CurrentDirectory` has wrong value when using `dotnet run` #30724
  • "dotnet --info" should display telemetry status (enabled/disabled) and the value of DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT #30723
  • Support for host file system access for Blazor/WASM from NodeJS env #30719
  • Dotnet Build -t:Test with ReadyToRun currently not allowing project references and content references combined #30718
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2117307 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update branding to enable a hotfix release #30712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Switch expression as a statement expression #2632
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make ExternalAccess.FSharp multi-target so it can be used by VSMac #66951
  • IDE0200 doesn't account for mutable structs #66950

Closed

  • Minor Bug: Icons in "fix all" window randomly change #20440
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't treat user-defined casts as constants in analyzers for "use pattern matching" and "convert if to switch" #66953
    Community
  • Solution.workspace #66952
  • Fix brokered service issues #66947
    Area-IDE
  • CodeStyleOption2 refactoring #66946
    Area-IDE
  • Delete service fetch that's not being used anyways #66945
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Refactor "Use 'not' pattern" analyzer & codefix #66949
    Community, Next

Updated

  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Parse parameter list on an interface in error recovery mode #66940
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Clean with authority #66925
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclose #46742
  • Blazor Webassembly Authentication Logout with OpenIDConnect endsession missing id_token_hint #46741
  • View component not being rendered using tag helper in published Linux application #46740
  • [Blazor] Improve the class `DataTransferItem` #46739
  • Prerendered hosted Blazor WebAssembly errors not addressed by guidance #46737

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #46685
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #46701
  • Perf regression: single_query #46730
  • Odd difference: AcceptedAtRoute uses GetUriByAddress. CreatedAtRoute uses GetUriByRouteValues. #46722

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose of old cancellationTokenSource instances during revalidation … #46736
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Source-build: Allow setting KnownAppHostPack and KnownRuntimePack #46735
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Transport.Quic.Tests: don't fail on distros that don't have quic. #46662
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46624
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview2
  • Fix AcceptedAtRoute link generation and add tests #46724
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Expose the original status code in StatusCodeReExecuteFeature #46539
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • great bug report #13439
  • TranslateTo/RotationY Causes Artefacts on Windows #13438
  • Page Title is not shown in correct position for Right To Left Languages #13435

Closed

  • Label control's height does not increase dynamically. #12284

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Merge net8.0 into release/8.0.1xx-preview1 #13441
  • Update net8.0 from main #13437

Updated

  • Include border size in windows MeasureOverride #13419
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix flyout offset measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 多线程读取多个在机械硬盘上的数据库文件 后续文件读取时间暴涨 (Multithreading reads multiple database files on the mechanical hard disk, and the subsequent file reading time skyrockets) #30309
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Internal.CSharpHelper' from assembly 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design, Version=6.0.7.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation #30308

Closed

  • entity insert order is not expected #30310
  • Scaffold-DbContext generates DateTime instead of DateTimeOffset for PostgreSQL database #30274

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back setter for scaffolded collection navigations #30311

Updated

  • Support JSON columns in compiled models #30254
  • feat: normalize migrations file #28367

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Increase branding version and downgrade implicit version to enable hotfix release #15587
